question: in the honour of which god is anant chaturdashi celebrated
api_result: Anant Chaturdashi is celebrated in honor of Lord Vishnu. It marks the end of the Ganesh Chaturthi festival, during which devotees bid farewell to Lord Ganesha. The day is also associated with the worship of the Anant (infinite) form of Lord Vishnu, and many people observe fasting and perform rituals to seek blessings for prosperity and well-being.
